name: SUPER SLIME BALL
description:
You are a slimeball who has lost its softness and can only be in a state of a ball. The only way to regain back the soft and squishiness is to find cakes that are scattered around the world.

Watermelons are Slimeball’s favourite food.

Game heavily inspired from Super Monkey Ball

Project Description

This game was underdevelopment for 1 month to show case for a physics programming module
